#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100005
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


int deg[1001];
vector<int>v[1001];
int main(){
	int t,n,m,i,a,b,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n>>m;
		set<int>s;
		set<int>::iterator it;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
			deg[i]=0;
			s.insert(i);
			v[i].clear();
		}	
		
		for(i=0;i<m;i++){
			scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
			deg[a]++;
			deg[b]++;
			v[a].pb(b);
			v[b].pb(a);
		}
		
		int ans=0;
		while(1){
			vector<int>rem;
			for(it=s.begin();it!=s.end();it++){
				if(deg[*it]==1)
				rem.pb(*it);
			}
			if(rem.empty())
			break;
			ans++;
			for(i=0;i<rem.size();i++){
				int node=rem[i];
				s.erase(node);
				for(j=0;j<v[node].size();j++){
					a=v[node][j];
					deg[a]--;
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
